original_title: Dunkelheit: The Tale of Varg Vikernes
overview: Norwegian black metal musician, Varg Vikernes, is being blamed for bringing negative attention to the black metal scene in Norway because of some revealing interviews involving church burnings. When Vikernes decides to foil a murder plot against him, he falls victim to his own bloodthirsty self defense...
title: Dunkelheit: The Tale of Varg Vikernes
